title: Introduction
code: ggplot(economics) +   geom_line(aes(date, unemploy), color = closest_mnb_color("blue")) +   theme_mnb_ts(base_size = 16) +    labs(subtitle = "Munkanélküliség az USA-ban") +    scale_y_number() options(lang = "en")  ggplot(economics) +   geom_line(aes(date, unemploy), color = closest_mnb_color("blue")) +   theme_mnb_ts(base_size = 16) +    labs(subtitle = "Unemployment in the USA") +    scale_y_number()

title: Introduction
text: developed function simple rewrite user specified colors ones matches corporate style.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Marcell Granát. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Granát M (2024). mnbplots: GGplot template functions MNB. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {mnbplots: GGplot template and functions for MNB},   author = {Marcell Granát},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

what: GGplot template and functions for MNB
title: GGplot template and functions for MNB
text: mnbplots collection color palettes themes specifically designed MNB. palettes designed accessible follow color scheme Brand Guidelines. package includes theme ggplot2, scales ggplot2, utility functions working colors. package designed easy use make easy create standard visualizations across team. package CRAN, install directly GitHub.

what: Find the closest MNB Color — closest_mnb_color
title: Find the closest MNB Color — closest_mnb_color
text: function takes vector colors returns closest matching color MNB color palette.

title: Find the closest MNB Color — closest_mnb_color
Find the closest MNB Color — closest_mnb_color
text: colors character vector color names hexadecimal codes. limit Numeric. maximum RGB distance allowed match. Default 200.

title: Find the closest MNB Color — closest_mnb_color
text: character vector closest matching MNB colors original color match found within limit.

title: Find the closest MNB Color — closest_mnb_color

what: MNB divergent colors for ggplot2 — scale_color_discrete_mnb_divergent
title: MNB divergent colors for ggplot2 — scale_color_discrete_mnb_divergent
text: function creates color scale using MNB color palette ggplot2.

title: MNB divergent colors for ggplot2 — scale_color_discrete_mnb_divergent
MNB divergent colors for ggplot2 — scale_color_discrete_mnb_divergent
text: ggplot2 color scale object.

title: MNB divergent colors for ggplot2 — scale_color_discrete_mnb_divergent
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot2::ggplot(iris) +    ggplot2::aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species) +   ggplot2::geom_point(size = 3) +    scale_color_discrete_mnb_divergent()

what: MNB Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb
title: MNB Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb
text: function creates color scale using MNB color palette ggplot2.

title: MNB Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb
MNB Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb
text: values Optional. vector color names. translated closest MNB color.

title: MNB Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb
text: ggplot2 color scale object.

title: MNB Color Scale for ggplot2 — scale_color_mnb
code: library(ggplot2) ggplot2::ggplot(iris) +    ggplot2::aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species) +   ggplot2::geom_point(size = 3) +    scale_color_mnb()   ggplot2::ggplot(iris) +    ggplot2::aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species) +   ggplot2::geom_point(size = 3) +    scale_color_mnb(values = c("red4", "blue", "yellow"))

code: library(ggplot2) ggplot2::ggplot(iris) +    ggplot2::aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, fill = Species) +   ggplot2::geom_point(size = 3, shape = 21) +    scale_fill_discrete_mnb_divergent()

what: MNB Time Series Theme for ggplot2 — theme_mnb_ts
title: MNB Time Series Theme for ggplot2 — theme_mnb_ts
text: function creates custom theme time series plots using MNB (Magyar Nemzeti Bank) style guidelines.

title: MNB Time Series Theme for ggplot2 — theme_mnb_ts
MNB Time Series Theme for ggplot2 — theme_mnb_ts
text: base_size Base font size theme. Default inherited ggplot2::theme_minimal().

title: MNB Time Series Theme for ggplot2 — theme_mnb_ts
text: ggplot2 theme object.

title: MNB Time Series Theme for ggplot2 — theme_mnb_ts
code: ggplot2::ggplot(economics, aes(x = date, y = unemploy)) +   ggplot2::geom_line(color = "#18223e", linewidth = 1.1) +   theme_mnb_ts()
